column2: SOP - Daily Container Bookings Cancellation Eligibility - Overview (azure.com)
This service takes an array of booking numbers as input and provides the eligible (with/without penalty) and ineligible ones for cancellation as output

column9: Array of booking numbers to be canelled
Array of booking numbers that can be cancelled wihtout penalty
Array of booking numbers that may incur penalty
Array of booking numbers that cannot be cancelled

column1: Must handle information message as an output
